lines.text:
[pointing to tracks]
Many horses come this way.
Them are our tracks! Damn you, Hawkeye, you done got us lost again!
Now we go to Mexico.
Mexico?
When you steal money, that's where you go. It's the Code of the West.
Empty your pockets!
Yes sir, Mr. Hardin.
You know my name, huh?
Yes sir. There ain't a fence post or a tree stump anywhere in these parts that don't have John Wesley Hardin's picture on it.
Ain't I seen a poster on you somewhere?
Yes sir. The name's Magee - Dingus Magee.
Oh, that ten dollar outlaw.
None but.

Ha! Ha! Ha! Hell, if I'd known that, I never would have held you up, but I got to steal something from you. Never stop a man for robbing unless you take at least something. That's the Code of the West.
This here is the chest from the stagecoach robbery and Dingus Magee estimates there may be as much as a million dolars in gold and silver pieces inside.
Well, the money ain't rightly ours, is it?
Finders keepers. That's the Code of the West, ain't it?
Gimme that crowbar!
Indians, sir!
My God, we're in luck. We will make our stand here, Sergeant!
Yes sir!
Circle the wagons!
We ain't got enough, sir.
Well, then make a half moon!
You like daughter?
Ah, yeah.
Me like gun. We make trade. I take gun. You take daughter. Marry.
Oh, well, ah, sir, she's a mighty nice girl and I like her a lot, but that's a fine looking rifle there.
Me keep rifle! You take daughter! Go honeymoon. Crazy Blanket has spoken!
Here he comes! Shall I shoot him in the back when he passes?
No! I want this to be a fair fight. I'll shoot him in the back. It's the Code of the West.
Where in the hell have you been?
At the jail taking care of my outlaw.
I didn't make you Sheriff to take care of your outlaw, but to protect my girls here.
[indicates her bordello]
Is somebody threatening them?
The Army is threatening them!
The Army is threatening to move out.
And ruin every industry in Yerke's Hole... especially mine!
Why would the Army move?
To go where the Indians are! That's what they come out west for - to fight Indians.
What we need is a good massacre.
There ain't nothing but tamed Indians around here, Belle.
Well, stir 'em up!
How?
Break a treaty! Speak with forked tongue! How the hell should I know? I never started an uprising before!

[hands Hoke a badge]
Here. You're the new sheriff.
Maybe I oughta be sworn in or something.
Raise your right hand. Swear.
To hell with Dingus Magee!
These army drills are hard on the girls.
Soldiers hard on, too.
You can say *that* again.
[repeated line]
Hot damn!

[after her bordello catches fire]
My cathouse!... My cathouse!... My cathouse is burning!
